text.modern: Satan sneers: "Who dares enter my realm? Are you the Son of God?"
text.old: Satan sneers: "Who dares enter my realm? Art thou the one who boasteth to be the Son of God?"

text.modern: Satan laughs: "A man who fears death, yet claims such power? I’ve prepared a cross for you!"
text.old: Satan laughs: "A man who feareth death, yet claimeth such power? I have prepared a cross for thee!"

text.modern: Satan roars: "Then let’s see your might, Son of God! Hell will not yield!"
text.old: Satan roars: "Then let us see thy might, Son of God! Hell shall not yield!"
